title: Come On Over
summary: Come On Over is the third studio album recorded by Canadian country music singer Shania Twain. It was released on November 4, 1997, and became the best-selling country album, 3rd best-selling studio album by a female artist and 2nd best selling album by a Canadian. It is the ninth all-time best-selling album in the United States,[1] and worldwide. It is also the sixteenth best-selling album in the United Kingdom.[2]
